lifeGoals.title: Quit Smoking
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Focus on gradually reducing your nicotine intake, explore therapy or a support group, and celebrate weekly milestones to reinforce progress.

lifeGoals.title: Exercise
milestones: Join a local gym or home workout routine
Increase to 5x per week after Month 1
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Begin with a baseline fitness assessment, pick activities you enjoy (like cycling or group fitness), and build habits by setting achievable weekly goals.

lifeGoals.title: Retirement
milestones: Open or increase contributions to retirement accounts
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Create a budget that increases savings by 10% each year, explore tax-advantaged accounts, and routinely rebalance investments for long-term growth.

lifeGoals.title: Start the RIA
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Outline your niche, register with the appropriate securities authority, build your tech stack and compliance procedures, then market your RIA services effectively.

lifeGoals.title: Eat Better
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Aim to replace processed foods with fresh produce, plan meals ahead of time, and track progress via a food journal or nutrition app.

lifeGoals.title: Buy a New Car
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Save a down payment over 12 months, research reliable models within your budget, and leverage online comparisons to get the best deal.

lifeGoals.title: Refinish Basement
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Plan a functional layout that adds both utility and resale value, gather multiple contractor bids, and set aside a contingency fund for unexpected costs.

lifeGoals.title: Clean Up Backyard
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Clear out clutter, trim overgrowth, consider adding simple landscaping features (like raised beds or mulch), and plan a maintenance schedule so it stays neat.
